Posts.Content: Mar 8, 2012 05:00AM Kaytre wrote: Hello all... I wanted to update on my situation. I got my results from my surgical biopsy and they mass of tissue was benign. There was cell division present but there were no aytipia cells present so it was not precancerous cells that were dividing. I am assuming that it is normal to have cell division as long as there are not atipical cells present? I did get a copy of the path report to keep with my films in case I need it. So I am assuming all is good. She wants to see me in a month to make sure everything heals correctly.
